transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Mukesh Thakur bol rahe ho?
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Sir main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se kaise hai aap?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Mukesh sir aapne ek mail kara hai IndiaMART par direct queries ko lekar.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To uske related Mukesh sir main aapki jo hai keywords dekh rahi thi. Mujhe organic fertilizer Mukesh ji baat nahi kar raha hu main yaha ka sales manager senior manager baat kar raha hu Niro Gandhi.
Executive: Accha. To Mukesh ji hai na wo MD hai to he can't talk right now. Wo sambhalte nahi hai main abhi abhi main sambhalunga kyuki Harendra ji abhi kya hai ki hum log unko job se shayad hi nikalne wale hai kyuki unhone IndiaMART se ek bhi wo nahi nikala hai business.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Fir bhi humne unko bola ki aap kyu aisa kar rahe ho to wo bole ki direct inquiry band ho gaya hai. Teen se char se baar ko bola gaya hai IndiaMART ko Binish ji ko fir wo unke jo bhi koi hai head unko bhi fir bhi kuch aa nahi raha hai to abhi ye subscription ka paisa dekar ye humko ye thodi karna hai ki baar baar aapko mail kare baar baar aapko phone kare.
Executive: Sir aap subscription le rahe hai matlab agar main last February se lekar abhi tak ka record dekhti hu aapke direct queries ka to direct query aapki kam to nahi hui hai matlab February se aapki. Ek bhi aayi nahi hai kam kya bol rahe ho. Kam sabhi mat kariye mere ko. Main aapka na apna mail aur apna IndiaMART portal dikhata hu ek direct inquiry nahi hai buyer details jo buyer inquiry hote hai na buyer lead wo hum le rahe hai baki direct inquiry ek bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir mere November month mein aapke paas 13 direct query hai October mein 34.
Customer: Ek bhi.
Executive: Ek bhi nahi hai ye main wahi bol raha hu. Aapko online hai to aa jaiye sir ek baar. Ha samne hi hu main. Aap le lijiye mere se wo jo bhi aapko lena hai.
Executive: Ek minute hold dijiye main aapko bhej rahi hu. Accha theek hai.
Customer: Agar ye hota to hum baar baar aapko kyu phone karte ya mail dalte mail bhi nahi dalte pehle to phone hi karte Binish ji ko par Binish ji aisa bol rahe hai ki kar denge.
Executive: Email id hai aapka.
Customer: ATM crops 403@gmail.com.
Executive: Matlab wahi registered wali hai na. Ha wahi hai usme hi face hota hai.
Executive: Ek minute hold dijiye. Maine bheja aapke paas link aaya dekhiye.
Customer: Nahi abhi tak to nahi hai.
Executive: ATM crops 403@gmail.com.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aaya hoga sir dekhiye. Check hum ya Richa Mahesh wahi wala na. Right. Ya. Joining with Google Meet yes okay.
Executive: Nahi main aapko ye bol raha hu Richa ji main ye kar deta hu aapko par aap mere ko ek baat bataye ye har baar aise hi karte hai Google Meet pe aate hai fir ye bolte hai ye karna hai mere ko ye nahi karna hai na mere ko direct inquiry chahiye solution chahiye.
Executive: Sir main aapko direct query main aapko bata rahi hu dekhiye business waise to aapke package mein inquiry ka mode kabhi define nahi tha inquiry aapke paas har mode se aayegi file list se bhi buyer call se bhi aayegi aur direct query se bhi aayegi ye buyer ki mechanism hai. Ab sir abhi main dikhana chah rahi hu aap keh rahe hai ki aapke paas ek bhi inquiry nahi hai that I will show you ki aisa nahi hai ki sir aapke paas ek bhi inquiry nahi hai.
Customer: To madam aap Google Meet chalu karo continue. Ha sir maine to join kara hai. Aap join kariye usme. Ek minute. Ye baar baar aata hai na agar resolution de sakte ho na to dijiye abhi main ek baar kar deta hu Google Meet mere ko abhi ek bande ka job ja raha hai aap uski seriousness ko janiye warna main escalate upar tak karunga mere ko ye accha nahi lagta mere MD aaj bahut bhadke hue hai.
Executive: Point ye nahi hai dekhiye. Point ye nahi hai ki hum hamare yaha se inquiries aa nahi rahi hai. Main aapko show karungi na aap dekhiye inquiry. Aapke waha pe show ho rahi hai wo show nahi hota hai na hamare yaha pe show honi chahiye na madam. Ha ha sir abhi aapke account se to show kar rahi hu. Tabhi to aapko join kara dekhiye abhi aapke system se voice aayi thi main yaha se phone disconnect kar sakti hu.
Customer: Ha kar dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states direct inquiries have stopped.

- Wants resolution instead of repeated Google Meets.

- Concerned about an employee losing their job.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to show inquiries on Google Meet.

- Executive clarified inquiry modes in package.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will show inquiries on Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, direct inquiry, google meet, subscription
